summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of AlphaMind trading assistant. Backend APIs working excellently (93.8% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with successful authentication, navigation, AI signal generation, trade execution, and real-time PnL tracking. All 5 markets including Futures confirmed working. Complete trade flow verified: Login → Generate Signal → Execute Trade → View Dashboard.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status 200 instead of expected 201 for trade creation

ui_bugs.workaround: Button enables after valid signal generation

passed_tests: User authentication (login with provided credentials: newtrader2024@test.com)
Market selection dropdown with all 5 markets (Crypto, Forex, Indices, Métaux, Futures)
Futures market symbols available (ES, NQ, CL, GC, SI)
AI signal generation with Claude Sonnet 4 (2-5 second response time)
Signal preview display with Entry/SL/TP/RR/Confidence levels
Open trades list with real-time floating PnL
Settings page with MT5 connection form and risk management
Market data retrieval for all asset classes
